title: My computer freezes every-time i log in and my computer is normally fine with LOL
body:
So yesterday i was playing with friends and my computer crashes, since it had an update, so i wasn't worried, then the 'Blue screen of death' comes up so it took me ages to log back in so i got the 5 min waiting before games. After the game, my computer crashed, which was odd so i just left to watch some T.V. When i tried to log in today, every-time after i logged into my account, nothing would load and my whole computer would completely freeze. The only way i could fix it was restarting it, which I've tried about 10 times now. There's a link i found here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/NemiGuOG-after-logging-in-lol-freezes-my-entire-computer-client 
This sounds exactly like my problem however it's fix didn't help me. 
Any tips would be great, I've tried re-installing it and the like already, no help.

replies.body:
To anyone who has the same problem, i solved it by right clicking the LOL shortcut, going to properties, compatibility and running it on windows 7. I also made the LOL run on admin. It would come up the same however after waiting 2 minutes the problem was resolved. 
~Catspeare

Hey there,

This definitely sounds odd, could you provide me with the exact error from that blue screen you received?
http://www.bleepingcomputer.com/forums/t/40108/how-to-use-event-viewer/

While you're at it, could you locate the latest dmp file (By default in C:\windows\minidump) and attach it in an email to **oce-wrenchmen@googlegroups.com** for me, please also include a link to your thread in the email.
